creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: Japanese maple bonsai plant with red and pink leaves set against a yellow-orange background; green moss in clay colored planter at bottom; two green leaves at top
inscription: Left: [1970ねんさく　もみじ] {1970nen saku, Momiji}; bottom, in pencil: [Maple] [Tsukasa Yoshida]
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Maple
